description:
(Also available for the TouchPad) ** Wall Blaster is an exciting and addictive game that can be played as single player or against each other. Similar to classic games like Jawbreaker, Bubble Breaker or Samegame, the goal is to score points by removing as many of the same colored blocks together. Just use all you fingers to touch on the blocks you want to remove. You can choose from 6 different field sizes and 6 differend game options. 

Interrupted? Just exit and the game is saved exactly as it was. Enjoy the challenge of blasting blocks in a clever and fun way!

* If you like this game, please leave a review. If not, please send me an email and tell me how I can improve it. Thanks!

* More on www.hausteinapps.com
